changelog: v1.5.3: Feedback rate limiting + dedup, GitHub Pages landing page, BugWatcher daemon, browser compat fixes (-webkit-backdrop-filter), launch_kam.bat, CLAUDE.md session ritual.
changes: NEW: Feedback rate limiting — 5 submissions per 60s per IP
NEW: Feedback dedup — identical message+category rejected within 1 hour
NEW: GitHub Pages landing page at https://kypin00-web.github.io/KAM-Sentinel
NEW: pages.yml workflow — auto-deploys docs/ on every push to main
NEW: scripts/bugwatcher.py — background auto-fix daemon with daily summaries
FIX: CSS -webkit-backdrop-filter added to all backdrop-filter declarations (Safari/older browser compat)
FIX: Bug feedback deduplication — 49-entry spam collapsed to 2 unique reports
DOCS: CLAUDE.md updated with session startup ritual, hosting, BugWatcher, feedback loop
